title: President Rajapaksa participates International Women’s Day Celebration in Sri Lanka
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix by:Nalin Hewapathirana) The National celebration of the International Women’s Day was held at Siribopura Singapore Community Hall in Hambantota under the patronage of the President Mahinda Rajapaksa and the First Lady Shiranthi Rajapaksa on 8th March. The International Women’s Day falls on today. Women’s contribution to the…
